Combining Magical Effects

@Embed[Compendium.black-flag.rules.JournalEntry.zHvTHITijHvb07FK.JournalEntryPage.qjh3trg4Wf01Z0Tu inline]

When a character casts a spell, the basic rules are the same regardless of the spell ring or its circle.

Each spell in this chapter includes basic information, including the spell’s name, ring, circle, school, casting time, range, required components, and duration. Every spell also contains a description of its effect.
